# AllocationInputDto

The exact allocation of guests to rooms.

**Properties**

| Name             | Type      | Required | Description                         |
| :--------------- | :-------- | :------- | :---------------------------------- |
| number_of_adults | int       | ✅       | The number of adults for this room. |
| children         | List[int] | ❌       | The children ages for this room.    |
